mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN g.sub_id IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(r.id,'-',g.sub_id) ELSE r.id END AS pk,r.id AS relate_id,r.code,r.parent_id,r.report_type,g.is_score,g.score_max,g.sub_id,a.process_mode,a.dict_id,a.grade FROM information_title_relate r INNER JOIN information_grade g ON r.id = g.title_relate_id LEFT JOIN information_grade_auto a ON a.title_relate_id = r.id WHERE 1=1 and r.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN g.sub_id IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(r.id,'-',g.sub_id) ELSE r.id END AS pk,r.id AS relate_id,r.code,r.parent_id,r.report_type,g.is_score,g.score_max,g.sub_id,a.process_mode,a.dict_id,a.grade
,rt.id AS value_id, CASE WHEN a.process_mode = 5 THEN rt.content_describe1 ELSE rt.content_choose END AS VALUE, rg.id AS score_id, CASE WHEN g.sub_id = 2 THEN rg.grade2 ELSE rg.grade1 END AS score
FROM information_title_relate r LEFT JOIN information_grade g ON r.id = g.title_relate_id LEFT JOIN information_grade_auto a ON a.title_relate_id = r.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM information_result WHERE project_id = #{projectId}) rt ON rt.title_id = r.title_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM information_result_grade WHERE project_id = #{projectId}) rg ON rg.title_relate_id = r.id
and r.id =#{relateId} and r.parent_id =#{parentId} and r.report_type =#{reportType} AND r.code LIKE CONCAT(#{code},'%')
and r.id in
#{item}
